title: Animal school: care of your pets
creator_credit: Charles Cahill and Associates, Charles Cahill and Ralph Helfer
brief_description: An animal trainer who teaches a tiger to do tricks for films, explains to his son the need for the same care and training with the boy’s dog. Animal trainers use love and affection in their work with animals, and are always calm and patient. Stresses the need for owners of domestic pets to accept the responsibility of ownership.
